name: Royal Deceit
summary_text: An old Norse legend of revenge, power and human spirit, that subsequently inspired William Shakespeare on his tragedy - Hamlet.

name: Mutant
summary_text: Two brothers discover that the residents of a small Southern town are being infected by a form of toxic waste, turning them into blood-ravenous zombies.

name: Scrooge
summary_text: Scrooge is mean old miser who wants nothing to do with Christmas. The Ghosts of Christmas Past, Present and Future appear to Scrooge, taking him on a journey into the very spirit and magic of Christmas itself.

name: The Oath
summary_text: A troubled father, working as a doctor, decides to go to extreme measures for saving his daughter from a devastating influence of her boyfriend, a drug dealer.

name: Lafangey Parindey
summary_text: Set in grungy Mumbai, an edgy love story of a blindfolded street fighter and a blind dancer and their never-say-die spirit to achieve the impossible.

name: Heroes
summary_text: Two boys travel a thousand miles to deliver three letters as a part of their film school assignment. However, little do they know that the journey they have embarked upon will give a new meaning to their life.

name: Sztuczki
summary_text: Six-year-old Stefek challenges fate. He believes that setting a chain of events in motion will help him get closer to his father who left his mother. His sister helps him bribe fate with ...                See full summary »

name: Before the Rains
summary_text: A English spice baron settles in South India during the waning years of the Raj.

name: Canyon Passage
summary_text: Businessman Logan Stuart is torn between his love of two very different women in 1850's Oregon and his loyalty to a compulsive gambler friend who goes over the line.

name: Les cowboys
summary_text: When his daughter goes missing from their prairie town east of France, Alain and his young son, Kid, head out to find her. The journey takes the men to some far-off and unsettling places in what begins to feel like an endless quest.

name: Kelly & Cal
summary_text: An ex punk rocker, who recently became a suburban housewife/mom, befriends a recently crippled high school boy.

name: Summer Holiday

name: Little Boy Blue
summary_text: 19 y.o. Jimmy' s dad is a vicious, impotent Vietnam vet, who forces his wife and son to have incest. He has a secret he'll kill to keep. Jimmy won't abandon his two kid brothers by leaving.

name: Il deserto dei tartari
summary_text: Lieutenant Giovanni Drogo is assigned to the old Bastiani border fortress where he expects an imminent attack by nomadic fearsome Tartars.

name: Eerie
summary_text: When a student's suicide rattles an all-girls Catholic school, a clairvoyant guidance counselor leans on a ghost to uncover the convent's abusive past.

name: If I Were You
summary_text: When a woman tries to outwit her husband's sexy young mistress, the unexpected consequences include starring as King Lear in a very amateur production - with the mistress, an aspiring actress, playing The Fool.

name: Citulja za Eskobara
summary_text: A comic look at Serbian criminal milieu, shown as a bunch of rude and primitive members deeply involved in organized crime which have its roots in their school days' friendship.

name: Gate 2: The Trespassers
summary_text: Four teens summon forth a diminuitive, demonic minion from The Other Side to do their bidding and grant their wishes, but of course, they must all ultimately pay the price...

name: The Gnome-Mobile
summary_text: In the Redwood Forests of California, a multi-millionaire lumberman and his two young grandchildren encounter two gnomes who are supposedly the last of their kind.

name: The Love Parade
summary_text: The queen of mythical Sylvania marries a courtier, who finds his new life unsatisfying.

name: The Accused
summary_text: A young student is the only one accused of the brutal murder of her best friend, a case that is excessively reported by the media. Cornered by the evidence, she must face her own doubts about what really happened.

name: Christmas in Evergreen
summary_text: Hoping to spur her longtime beau to action, a small-town veterinarian wishes upon a snow globe that this will be her most romantic Christmas ever.

name: Walk. Ride. Rodeo.
summary_text: A courageous teenager is determined to resume competitive rodeo months after her paralyzing spinal cord injury.

name: Sex, Love & Therapy
summary_text: Lambert is an addict. A sex addict. It once cost him his pilot job, but he's now trying to work it out through a support group and a new career as couples therapist. Judith has no problem. ...                See full summary »

name: Black Out
summary_text: After ruthless gangsters wrongfully accuse him of stealing from them, a retired criminal has 24 hours to creep back into his past life and retrieve a bag of coke before his fiancée is killed.

name: Zeroville
summary_text: A young ex-communicated seminarian, Ike "Vikar" Jerome, arrives in Los Angeles on the same August day in 1969 that a crazed hippie ''family'' led by Charles Manson commits five savage murders.

name: Cyber Seduction: His Secret Life
summary_text: A high school kid (Sumpter) develops an addiction to Internet porn so intense that it begins to destroy his life and tear his family apart.

name: Sa'eedi fil gamaa el amrekeia
summary_text: It's a story about Khalaf Al Dahshori a young man from a small village in Upper Egypt (Sa'ed). Who gets a scholarship to the American University in Cairo, after getting the 2nd highest ...                See full summary »

name: Chelsea Walls
summary_text: This movie tells five stories set in a single day at the famed Chelsea Hotel in New York City, involving an ensemble cast of some 30-35 characters.

name: Hidden Assassin
summary_text: A CIA agent gets caught up in political intrigue after he gets brought in to solve the murder of a Cuban ambassador.

name: Lipstick
summary_text: A top fashion model seeks justice after she is brutally raped by her teenaged sister's music teacher.

summary_text: This movie depicts the authentic story of the hunt for the dangerous criminal Emile Buisson, who escaped from prison in 1947. During three years Buisson manages to hide from detective ...                See full summary »

name: The Return of Doctor X
summary_text: A hotshot reporter and a young doctor team up to investigate a series of grisly murders and a mysterious sample of synthetic blood.

name: Father
summary_text: A small town in Serbia. Nikola, day laborer and father of two, is ordered to give up his children to social services after poverty and hunger drive his wife to commit a desperate act. Until...                See full summary »

name: Temps
summary_text: Steph works with 3 other temps. One helps her get over her ex. But what is it they have together (besides wild sex)?

name: Bad Kids of Crestview Academy
summary_text: 5 high school students get Saturday detention. One tries to find her sister's killer. When hit by a computer virus, the school goes on lockdown and the killing continues.

name: Der ganz große Traum
summary_text: An English teacher brings soccer from England to Germany in the late 19th Century by teaching it to his class.

name: Lejdis
summary_text: Four friends are facing problems like infidelity, infertility and disease. But together, they can solve every single problem.

name: Pagafantas

name: Divorcing Jack
summary_text: Black romantic comedy set around the troubled "peace process" and its effect on a cynical Belfast hack.

name: Deadbeat at Dawn
summary_text: One last job separates the leader of the Ravens gang from an early retirement. When he finds his girlfriend beaten to death by members of a rival gang, he seeks revenge, knowing that he may be dead by dawn. Will more blood bring her back?

name: Lady in Cement
summary_text: During an ocean dive, Miami gumshoe Tony Rome (Frank Sinatra) finds a woman's body with her feet encased in a concrete block and sets out to solve the murder case.

name: Krazzy 4
summary_text: 4 mental patients formulate the plan to rescue their kidnapped doctor and teach the kidnappers a lesson.

name: The President's Man
summary_text: A U.S. president's highly classified secret agent must find a fearless replacement to take over his extremely dangerous military missions.

name: Place Vendôme
summary_text: Realising a dishonest deal has been found out a diamond merchant commits suicide, leaving the gems in question for his wife. Knowing the business from the time before drink largely took ...                See full summary »

name: Fatima
summary_text: Based on historical events, three young shepherds in Fátima, Portugal, report visions of the Virgin Mary, inspiring believers and angering officials of the Church and the government, who try to force them to recant their story.

name: Kanojo no omoide
summary_text: "Magnetic Rose" is about what happens when a deep space corporate freighter is called upon to investigate a distress signal from what ought to be a derelict space station. The space station...                See full summary »

name: Galerianki
summary_text: Shopping malls are today's places of creating desires with the best jewelry, clothes and shoes. Unaffordable to young girls who decide to "work" to get themselves sponsors for new items.

name: Hîrtia va fi albastrã
summary_text: Out of enthusiasm, a Militia soldier abandons his platoon and decides to fight for the cause of the Revolution. His Lieutenant and the rest of the crew look for him during the confused night of 22-23 December 1989.

name: Thenali
summary_text: A neurotic Sri Lankan patient crashes his psychotherapist's family vacation in Kodaikanal.

name: The Wax Mask
summary_text: Paris, 1900: a couple are horribly murdered by a masked man with a metal claw who rips their hearts out. The sole survivor and witness to the massacre is a young girl. Twelve years later in...                See full summary »

name: Breeders
summary_text: The Manhattan General Hospital admitted a string of young women raped by something otherworldly. Dr. Pace and Detective Andriotti try and isolate the strange organic material found on the victims to find the fiend.

name: Speedway
summary_text: Poor bookkeeping saddles stock car driver Steve Grayson with a huge bill for back taxes which hampers his ability to continue racing competitively.

name: Vengeance Valley
summary_text: The sons of a Colorado cattle baron, one biological and the other adopted, resent one another and fight for control of their father's cattle empire.

name: Remélem legközelebb sikerül meghalnod:)
summary_text: Eszter has a crush on her english teacher, but he announces that he will leave the county for a foreign job. So she starts a sexting relationship with him.

name: Believer
summary_text: A police detective determined to catch the unseen boss of Asia's biggest drug cartel joins hands with a revenge-thirsty member of the gang.

name: The Kindness of Strangers
summary_text: The story of people whose lives intertwine during a dramatic winter in New York City.

name: Louis Theroux: A Place for Paedophiles
summary_text: Louis visits Coalinga Mental Hospital in California, home to over 500 convicted paedophiles, and spends some time with those undergoing treatment.

name: The Other Me
summary_text: Will Browning accidentally creates a clone of himself when working on a science project.

name: Thoppil Joppan
summary_text: Joppan's failed romance excuses him to be an alcoholic. Hoping to start a new life, he seeks out for some love but would fate favor him this time?

name: The Living
summary_text: A man hires an ex-con to kill his sister's abusive husband, but the desperate act sets into motion a shocking series of events in this intense indie drama.

name: The Perfect Husband
summary_text: A married couple decide to spend a weekend in a remote cabin, but the romantic journey takes a turn for the worst, when a sneaking suspicion becomes pure madness.

name: Colt 45
summary_text: The young police man Vincent is the best in his class, and denies to be recruited to the special forces. But when the corrupt Milo manages to get a grip on him, his life is turned into a living nightmare.

name: K-20: The Fiend with Twenty Faces
summary_text: Set in a fictional Japanese city in 1949, a master criminal hones in on his latest victim.

name: Gone with the Woman
summary_text: A woman moves into a young man's home and starts to run his life -- a process that makes him fall hopelessly in love with her.

name: Tex
summary_text: After their mother dies and their father leaves them, teenage brothers Tex and Mason McCormick struggle to make it on their own.

name: Marianne & Juliane
summary_text: Two sisters both fight for women's rights. Juliane is a journalist and Marianne a terrorist. When Marianne is jailed, Juliane feels obligated to help her despite their differing views on how to live.

name: Put Grandma in the Freezer
summary_text: Simone, a clumsy financier, falls in love with Claudia, who's living on her grandma's retirement checks. When the old lady dies Claudia hides the body in a freezer, and sets up a fraud with the help of some friends to avoid bankruptcy.

name: First Match
summary_text: Hardened by years in foster care, a teenage girl from Brooklyn's Brownsville neighborhood decides that joining the boys wrestling team is the only way back to her estranged father.

name: Track 29
summary_text: Linda is still tormented by giving up a baby for adoption at 15. She wants a baby, but her husband has enough in his model trains, mistress and being a doctor.

name: Stadt Land Fluss
summary_text: A drama that tracks the relationship between two young apprentices working on an agricultural complex south of Berlin.

name: Hair Brained
summary_text: 14-year old genius Eli is rejected from Harvard, and ends up at Ivy League wannabe Whittman-U. There, Eli meets 41 year-old Leo, a gambler who has dropped out of life to enroll in college, who teaches him every bad habit he knows.

name: Inspector Bellamy
summary_text: A well known Parisian inspector becomes involved in an investigation while on holiday.

name: Save Me
summary_text: A sex and drug-addicted young man who is forced into a Christian-run ministry in an attempt to cure him of his "gay affliction," where instead he is faced with the truth in his heart and spirit.

name: Darling Lili
summary_text: Set during World War I, this movie is a cute spin on the Mata Hari legend.

name: Fanny
summary_text: A love triangle between a young woman, a rich 60-something man and an aspiring sailor set in early 20th century Marseilles.

name: 125 Years Memory
summary_text: Based on two historical incidents that deepened the friendship between Japan and Turkey.

name: Simple Agi Ondh Love Story
summary_text: Kushal (Rakshit Shetty) is sent by his radio jockey sister Rachana to Kodagu to meet her boyfriend's sister in the hope that the two will take a liking to each other, leading to marriage, ...                See full summary »

name: Kirishima, bukatsu yamerutteyo
summary_text: A story about the disappearance of Kirishima, a star athlete of the volleyball club, and how this affects every person in his school.

name: The 39 Steps
summary_text: Richard Hannay, a mining engineer on holiday from the African colonies, finds London socialite life terribly dull. Yet it's more than he bargained for when secret agent, Scudder, bursts ...                See full summary »

name: Udayananu Tharam
summary_text: An artist performs best when he doesn't know he's being filmed.

name: The Rats
summary_text: A clan of evil rats overtakes a Manhattan department store and threatens to overrun the city.

name: Thaniyavartanam
summary_text: A school teacher living in a village belongs to a family with a history of lunatic males, and soon he falls prey despite being normal due to society misinterpreting his actions.

name: A Slight Case of Murder
summary_text: Former bootlegger Remy Marco has a slight problem with forclosing bankers, a prospective son-in-law, and four hard-to-explain corpses.

name: Above the Shadows
summary_text: A young woman who has faded to the point of becoming invisible must find her way back with the help of the one man who can see her.

name: Apocalypse Pompeii
summary_text: Mount Vesuvius erupts when a family visits Pompeii. The daughter uses her skill and her father his ability, in order to escape the disaster.

name: How to Be a Serial Killer
summary_text: A serial killer decides to teach the secrets of his satisfying career to a video store clerk.
